snippet: HEYMAN--Anne. Profound and heartfelt condolence wishes to the entire HeymanMerrin family. It was a privilege to have served on the Board of DOROT under Anne's Presidency. She brought intelligence, enthusiasm, and vision to DOROT's activities. Her ...
lead_paragraph: HEYMAN--Anne. Profound and heartfelt condolence wishes to the entire HeymanMerrin family. It was a privilege to have served on the Board of DOROT under Anne's Presidency. She brought intelligence, enthusiasm, and vision to DOROT's activities. Her zest for life was contagious, and her love for her family was unparalleled. Fiona Scharf
